str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Mysia, a region of Asia Minor.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To allow, permit, let alone, leave. Of uncertain affinity; to let be, i.e. Permit or leave alone.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
